import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.scss'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { activeMenu = false; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } toggleMenu(): void { this.activeMenu = !this.activeMenu; } }
